message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12000. This is a special opportunity tailored to your needs, considering the product's worth to you stands at $10000. I'm confident this investment will pay off significantly for your company. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
